title: The Forest Nymph
description: "Five paces from him, just before the tree line, stood a Nymph. She was stunningly beautiful, and he was immediately filled with a carnal hunger. Nymphs are normally skittish creatures, existing mainly in legends and embelli shed travelers stories. If you were lucky, they could be seen in places of natural wonder, like waterfalls, shallow caves or clearings.."An encounter with a nymph in a clearing gets interesting...
author: Jasmin Wild
